code: import{init as initSentry,captureMessage}from'@sentry/browser';import env from'./environment';import{getNetworkType}from'./lib/web3-utils';export var sentryEnabled=Boolean(env('SENTRY_DSN'));export default function initializeSentry(){if(sentryEnabled){initSentry({dsn:env('SENTRY_DSN'),environment:getNetworkType(env('CHAIN_ID')),release:'court-dashboard@'+env('BUILD')});}}export function logWithSentry(message){var level=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'warning';if(sentryEnabled){captureMessage(message,level);}}
